titles.title: Reclaiming Individual Liberty Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the mandate that individuals purchase health insurance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/6/2015--Introduced. Reclaiming Individual Liberty Act
This bill repeals the provision in the Internal Revenue Code, as added by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, that requires individual taxpayers to purchase and maintain minimum essential health care coverage.
